DOC.brief_summary: Female sex worker ( FSWs ) India high risk HIV infection , correct consistent condom use effective mean prevent HIV transmission , many FSWs difficulty insist use . Alternative HIV prevention option need FSWs unable correctly consistently use condoms client regular partner . Oral pre-exposure prophylaxis ( PrEP ) may important tool fill critical prevention gap , demonstration project require assess impact feasibility use PrEP HIV prevention intervention among risk FSWs India . The propose project take place two site India ass use risk assessment tool identify FSWs would benefit PrEP , collect information reason FSWs choose accept decline PrEP , evaluate two different PrEP delivery strategy ( weekly clinic pick-up home delivery peer educator every second day ) , monitor adherence discontinuation PrEP , evaluate unintended consequence use PrEP community ( e.g . reduction condom use , drug side effect adverse event , social harm resistance ) . To ensure safety study participant , community advisory board set meet regularly inform study staff concern community may relate study , study staff respond timely manner . A data safety monitor board also establish monitor participant safety .
DOC.brief_title: Demonstrating Safety Effective Delivery Daily Oral Pre-exposure Prophylaxis ( PrEP ) Sex Workers India
DOC.detailed_description: This PrEP demonstration study design assess feasibility impact deliver PrEP addition exist package HIV prevention intervention available female sex worker India . The study aim : 1 ) identify female sex worker need HIV prevention willing take PrEP ; 2 ) evaluate sustain uptake adherence oral PrEP ; 3 ) ass safe delivery PrEP ; 4 ) demonstrate effective delivery PrEP within context National Program Targeted Interventions . The study implement two region among two typology female sex worker India : brothel-based FSWs Kolkata FSWs operate different setting Mysore Mandya . Outcome 1 : Identification female sex worker need HIV prevention willing take oral PrEP For optimal delivery limited resource , critical provide HIV prevention strategy PrEP population great risk infection . Female sex worker important population HIV prevention India , prioritize `` core high risk group '' target intervention India National AIDS Control Organization ( NACO ) ( NACO 2013 annual report ) . In particular , FSWs report inconsistent condom use unmet need HIV prevention ( Ramesh , 2010 ; Reza-Paul , 2008 ) . For example , woman may less empowered able consistently demand condom use client may wish become pregnant . PrEP potential additional , acceptable effective HIV prevention method female sex worker difficulty use condom consistently . This study propose development use risk screen tool identify female sex worker vulnerable HIV . This tool guide recruitment demonstration study could later assist health provider decide benefit PrEP HIV prevention . In addition , study assess proportion FSWs identify risk screen tool willing take PrEP . Quantitative qualitative evaluation identify factor related decision initiate PrEP well reason FSWs decline PrEP . Outcome 2 : Sustained uptake adherence oral PrEP among female sex worker Similar medication , sustain uptake adherence PrEP fundamental efficacy prevent HIV acquisition . In four clinical trial oral PrEP demonstrate efficacy , study participant high adherence great protection HIV ( Baeten 2012 , Choopanya 2013 , Grant 2010 , Thigpen 2012 ) . Likewise , across PrEP trial , clear relationship high efficacy great proportion participant study drug detectable blood . Two randomized clinical trial daily oral PrEP among heterosexual woman Africa find efficacy HIV prevention ; poor adherence PrEP likely explain result ( Marrazzo 2013 , Van Damme 2012 ) . For example , drug level test FEM-PrEP Study find less 40 % random sample HIV negative woman PrEP arm study detectable level PrEP blood ( Van Damme 2012 ) . Analyses high-risk subgroup study participant Partners PrEP Study find PrEP efficacy estimate range 64 84 % , show consistently high efficacy PrEP prevent HIV across various high risk group , include woman ( Murnane 2013 ) . Preliminary community awareness campaign PrEP among female sex worker Kolkata find high interest PrEP - approximately 80 % report willingness take daily , oral PrEP . Sex worker Mysore-Mandya engage series consultation information relate PrEP tool combination prevention discuss question concern related PrEP address . In place , initial observation show sex worker ( e.g . long time contract , overnight client sometimes number client disclose , want pregnant , use condom regular partner ) express interest part demonstration project . This PrEP demonstration study assess acceptability feasibility two approach PrEP delivery : 1 ) peer educator delivery every day ; 2 ) weekly clinic pick-up . Study staff measure PrEP initiation , adherence discontinuation . They record event participant record , quarterly visit use assess adherence biological test questionnaire . PrEP deliver part package HIV prevention service , therefore use prevention strategy , condom use , also monitor . The full package prevention service continue provide FSWs support India 's national government accordance national guideline . Data drug adherence condom use collect various mean . An ethnographic study design understand factor may promote impede adherence PrEP , well change risk behaviour ( reduction condom use ) . In addition , peer educator use pictorial tool document item ( e.g. , frequency pattern sexual activity , condom use , PrEP use ) . The study also include biological measure PrEP adherence assessment drug-levels blood . Regular counsel HIV prevention PrEP provide study participant promote adherence . In sub-sample study participant , electronic adherence monitoring device measure promote adherence , Helping Hands , test ( De Blaser 2010 ) . The Helping Hands device compliment web platform illustrate patient-specific data monitor dose history adherence pattern . Outcome 3 : Oral HIV PrEP part combine prevention package deliver safely female sex worker Four randomize control trial demonstrate daily , oral PrEP safe HIV-uninfected woman wide range setting ; antiretrovirals prove safe HIV-infected woman many year use . The common side effect FTC/TDF minor short-lived ( i.e . first several week ) . This study provide evidence safe delivery oral PrEP female sex worker brothel street-based setting India . Quarterly clinic visit assess physical health , side effect , adverse event social harm concern PrEP use . This study invest continuous engagement community female sex worker accord good participatory practice guideline provide correct information PrEP , keep community continuously engage , maintain adherence PrEP . In addition , ongoing qualitative research monitoring research staff , well outreach peer educator , attempt identify community resistance , rumour actual harm , respond appropriate manner . Outcome 4 : Effective delivery oral HIV PrEP demonstrate context National Program Targeted Interventions This study propose deliver PrEP within context National Program Targeted Interventions order demonstrate PrEP feasible `` real world '' setting . DMSC Ashodaya currently implement target intervention program female sex worker Kolkata Mysore/Mandya , respectively . These program provide outreach peer educator outreach worker , clinic service ( e.g . HIV test counseling , STI screen treatment ) , referral HIV care treatment brothel- street-based FSWs . This study evaluate addition PrEP exist service delivery model . It also show willingness participant enroll demonstration study use oral PrEP without reimbursement incentive participation . Study finding inform national local government 's decision adopt PrEP new HIV prevention strategy . Development HIV prevention package , provider training , quality management service delivery guideline line national system provide guidance real life implementation PrEP , also contribute large goal provide standard delivery HIV prevention intervention . DOC.criteria: Selfidentification current FSW Age 18 older Selfreported interest willingness take PrEP Score cutoff risk screen tool / PrEP indication tool HIVnegative test time enrollment ( per test algorithm ) No clinical sign acute HIV infection HepatitisB virus antigen negative ( upon screen ) Creatinine clearance ≥ 60ml/min ( CockcroftGault formula ) ( upon screen ) Not currently take PrEP enrol another PrEP demonstration project Negative urine pregnancy test time enrollment Lives within catchment area project site plan move away project area next 16 month Under 18 Does meet inclusion criterion
